name: Sliding Boi
description:
For the Minijam#75! I chose to try to do a puzzle sandbox, sadly i started late and ran out of time so i couldnt explore the sandbox part of the game as much, also wanted to make a level editor and much much much more items.

Play in fullscreen to prevent weird scaling (i dont know how to fix that ;-;)

Any feedback on the base game and the idea behind this would be appreciated (I know the level design was very simple/rushed)

Enjoy and have a good one :D
